actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for purposes of veterans benefits for a certain disability suffered by former prisoners of war.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide a presumption of service connection (for purposes of eligibility for veterans' benefits) for spastic colon condition suffered by former prisoners of war.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for purposes of veterans benefits for a certain disability suffered by former prisoners of war.
